headline: Down 8%, 9%, and 13% in 3 Months, These 3 High-Yield Dividend Stocks Are Buys in December
summary: Despite a sustained rally in the S&P 500, many top utility stocks have sold off in recent months, including industry leaders like Southern Company (NYSE: SO), American Electric Power (NASDAQ: AEP), and NextEra Energy (NYSE: NEE).  Here's why these three high-yield utility stocks are worth buying now.  The utility and its subsidiaries -- including traditional electric operating companies like Alabama Power, Georgia Power, and Mississippi Power -- provide electric and gas services to customers and work with government agencies and regulators to set prices.
